title: Bitwise OR of Adjacent Elements
content:
Given an array nums of length n, return an array answer of length n - 1 such that answer[i] = nums[i] | nums[i + 1] where | is the bitwise OR operation.

 

Example 1:

Input: nums = [1,3,7,15]

Output: [3,7,15]

Example 2:

Input: nums = [8,4,2]

Output: [12,6]

Example 3:

Input: nums = [5,4,9,11]

Output: [5,13,11]

 

Constraints:

  • 2 <= nums.length <= 100
  • 0 <= nums[i] <= 100
